long_description: The Atlas Mini 17 snowshoes offer girls from 4 to 8 years old sure-footed traction, flotation and durability for snowy play. And the newly designed heel straps offer lightening-fast entry and exit. Grom Bindings secure feet comfortably and adjust easily with nylon webbing toe straps and new quick-buckling urethane heel straps; parents spend less time kneeling in the snow. Molded tongues and padded instep straps ensure a snug, cozy fit for winter shoes and boots. Sturdy V-Frame molded plastic decks provide flotation and traction and ensure the same efficient stride adult-size snowshoes offer. Tempered-steel toe crampons offer positive traction for climbing; molded traction under heels adds to grip without excess metal. Fun snowflake pattern is stamped into snow with each step, adding another reason for smiles. Atlas Mini Snowshoes measure 6.5 x 17 in. and are recommended for children ages 4 - 8 or a total weight load of 30 - 80 lbs (includes weight of hiker with gear).
